content.text:
# Korea: Battleground for Liberty

Korea: Battleground for Liberty is a 1959 documentary film about the Korean War directed by John Ford.
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20171217053805/http://www.bfi.org.uk/films-tv-people/4ce2b73597f29 Korea: Battleground for Liberty] at BFI
